document.full_text: news corp  has promoted james murdoch to the role of deputy chief operating officer in a move that will be seen to mark him as eventual successor to his 80-year-old father, rupert.
document.title: news corp promotes james murdoch to new york role
lines_and_colors: news corp  has promoted james murdoch to the role of deputy chief operating officer in a move that will be seen to mark him as eventual successor to his 80-year-old father, rupert.
